document_data.name: ''Olinsivver's Gage''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|94}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Olinsivver's Gage''''' was one of the treasures in the [[Vault of Ages]].
document_data.Powers: The glove granted the user's fingertips power to re-sculpt the skin of battered or disfigured faces.
document_data.History: ''Olinsivver's Gage'' was in the [[Vault of Ages]] as of {{yearlink|241}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|131-132|6}}
